info.title: Notary API
info.description: API providing SCITT transparency service claims and receipts

tags.name: Notary
tags.description: Get SCITT claims and receipts for rkvst events

post.summary: Get a SCITT claim for an event
post.description: Get a SCITT COSE format claim object for an event

401.description: Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

403.description: Returned when the user is not authorized to get a receipt for the event

404.description: Returned when the asset with the id does not exist. or the event with the id does not exist

429.description: Returned when a user exceeds their subscription's rate limit for requests.

parameters.name: identity
parameters.description: relative resource address of an event. retstricted `assets/{UUID}/events/{UUID}` or public `publicassets/{UUID}/events/{UUID}` are both supported

parameters.name: block_hash
parameters.description: the block hash e.g 0x5c6726d7570046c6c4b20e97de1486877f293ba1e4d3b64c13b671354c2f8266, defaults to latest block if both hash and number are omitted

parameters.name: block_number
parameters.description: the block number as a hexidecimal number e.g. 0x1a95f, or `latest` for the latest block, defaults to latest block if both hash and number are omitted

post.summary: Get a SCITT receipt for a claim produced by this service
post.description: Get a SCITT COSE format receipt object for a claim produced by this service

401.description: Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

403.description: Returned when the user is not authorized to get a receipt for the claim or its subjects

404.description: Returned when the subject of the claim does not exist

429.description: Returned when a user exceeds their subscription's rate limit for requests.

get.description: Get OpenAPI v2.0 spec for Notary

401.description: Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

429.description: Returned when a user exceeds their subscription's rate limit for requests.

v1CreateEventClaimResponse.description: A claim on an event which can be redeemed for a receipt

v1CreateReceiptResponse.description: A SCITT receipt for a previously obtained claim
